description.value:
Special: SM Wep, Devastating (1), Power Field, Unwieldy

Note: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Powersword of the Blood Drinkers Chapter. Two-Handed. Wielder can drink the blood of any target they deal wounds to with this weapon to avert the Blood Craving curse of their Chapter.

system.notes: Space Marines Only. Master-Crafted Relic Astartes Powersword of the Blood Drinkers Chapter. Two-Handed. Wielder can drink the blood of any target they deal wounds to with this weapon to avert the Blood Craving curse of their Chapter.
